Recent updates from NYC include a tragic incident involving a woman struck by a train at Grand Central, the emergence of a highly contagious 'super flu,' and ongoing negotiations for hospital nurses' contracts amid looming strikes, alongside significant developments in public transportation and housing oversight.

### Risks & Alerts

- Woman on subway tracks at NYC Grand Central station struck by train. - MTA making emergency repairs to Manhattan bus depot, expect delays. ### Civics & Politics

- Governor Hochul declares a disaster emergency in NYC due to healthcare staffing shortages.
